name: Eat Sheep & Die
description:
A small arcade game made for Ludum Dare 33.


You play as an outcast wolf, take on the guise of your prey as you consume the cute little sheep, the more camouflage you are, the slower you move but sheep will no longer flee from you.

Other wolves however see you as prey and the farmer just may try and sheer you!

The sheep will reproduce over time, try not eat them all as this will lower your chance of survival.
